summary: This is an arrest warrant issued by a U.S. Magistrate Judge for Ghislaine Maxwell, commanding law enforcement to arrest her on charges including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury. The warrant was issued in White Plains, NY, as part of case number 20cr330 in the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual named in the arrest warrant, accused of multiple federal offenses related to the enticement and transportation of minors, and perjury.

persons.name: Lisa Margaret Smith
persons.context: The judicial officer who signed and issued the arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Arrest Warrant Issued for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A U.S. Magistrate Judge issued an arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell on federal charges including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.

keyFacts: An arrest warrant was issued for Ghislaine Maxwell on June 29, 2020.
The warrant was issued by U.S. Magistrate Judge Lisa Margaret Smith.
The charges include conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.
The case is filed in the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York under case number 20cr330.
The warrant was issued in White Plains, NY.
